fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Sir Martin Moore-Bick, the Grenfell inquiry’s chair, is a retired judge of the appeal court, not the high court (Call for end to default advice in emergencies, 31 October, page 17). • A feature about luxury skyscrapers in Manchester referred to the city’s “affluent suburbs – Altringham, Wilmslow, Didsbury”. That should have been Altrincham (Welcome to Manc-hattan, 21 October, page 10, G2).
